nodes.text: The V-302 Guard Droid was a model of battle droid used as security units on the Red Light Sector Concourse on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The V-302 Guard Droid appears on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
